page.title: 06Collingb'ne Area Farming
page.content: Collingbourne Kingston is a mixed farming area consisting of fields of barley, oats and wheat grown in rotation with grasses and root crops (stubble turnips and kale). The high quality cereals are sold, barley for malting for beer, wheat for milling into flour and oats for breakfast cereals. A certain amount of high grade wheat and barley will be stored for intervention by the government for the E.E.C., the remainder will be used for cattle and pig feed on the farm. The wheat yields 2\_3 tons per acre, barley yields 2_2\ tons per acre and oats yields 2_2\ tons per acre. The average size field in this area is 30 acres.
